## Material.getOrCreateProgram() method

Fetch the gpu program of the material for drawing

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOrCreateProgram(ctx: DrawContext): ProgramInfo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ctx | [DrawContext](doc/markdown/./scene.drawcontext.md) | The context for current drawing task |

**Returns:**

ProgramInfo

Information of the gpu program
